name: Area 52 (kevinmcenroe)
description:
Escape the Facility

Captured by a team of Researchers and locked in a top-secret facility, homesick alien "Goo" must find a way to escape in this top-down stealth game. Use his unique morphing ability to change form and avoid detection. The maze-like confines of Area 52 are no place for this little alien!

Choose a Form

Use Goo's different forms to your advantage as you venture through Area 52

  • Goo's Normal Form is an all-rounder, great for stealthily creeping past Researchers on your journey to the exit
  • Goo's Box Form goes unnoticed by Researchers but is especially geometric. You won't be sliding around in this form
  • Goo's Car Form is great for high-speed manoeuvres. Don't hit the gas around Researchers though, the rev of the engine may catch their attention
Controls

W, S, A, D  =  Forward, Backwards, Strafe Left, Strafe Right

Mouse Position  =  Direction of Travel

Q and E   =  Cycle through Transformations

Spacebar  =   Select Transformation

Developer Notes
  • Game created by Kevin McEnroe
  • For the best experience, playing on Google Chrome is recommended
  • If you have any feedback, feel free to get in touch. Much appreciated!
